EntryName	RL12_HUMAN
ProteinName	Large ribosomal subunit protein uL11 (60S ribosomal protein L12)
GeneName	RPL12
Length	165
Function	Component of the large ribosomal subunit (PubMed:25901680). The ribosome is a large ribonucleoprotein complex responsible for the synthesis of proteins in the cell (PubMed:25901680). Binds directly to 26S ribosomal RNA (PubMed:25901680).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm
